meanings.definition: A Greek meze or appetizer made from fish roe, bread crumbs, olive oil, lemon juice, and seasonings.
meanings.sent1: The taramasalata at the party was a hit with its unique blend of flavors.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy spreading taramasalata on my pita bread for a tasty snack.
meanings.sent3: When the cat mistook the taramasalata for fish, it made for a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like taramasalata, spreading joy around the room.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant pink color of the taramasalata made it stand out on the table.

meanings.definition: A creamy dip or spread typically served with pita bread or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The taramasalata dip was so smooth and creamy, it melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: We ran out of taramasalata at the picnic because everyone loved it so much.
meanings.sent3: The taramasalata decided to take a dip in the pool of hummus for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: Her smile spread across her face like a dollop of taramasalata on warm bread.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly made taramasalata filled the kitchen with a delightful scent.
